cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 95 mi ENE of Daytona Beach, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-northwest, then turning north and north-northeast while paralleling the Southeast U.S. coast toward South Carolina and North Carolina
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the South Carolina coast (around Charleston–Myrtle Beach area)

port.name: Port of Palm Beach District, FL

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Sebastian Inlet FL northward; Hurricane Watch/Warning farther north of Ponte Vedra Beach FL
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm Surge Warning Sebastian Inlet FL to Surf City NC; Hurricane Warning Volusia/Brevard County line FL to Ponte Vedra Beach FL and northward
weather_observation.impacted_coast: East coast of Florida through the Carolinas
weather_observation.wind: Outer bands may bring brief tropical-storm-force gusts (35–40 mph) but sustained gale conditions are unlikely (≤8% probability).
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge of 1–2 ft possible; main surge threat lies north of the port.
weather_observation.rainfall: Squalls could drop 1–3 inches of rain; widespread totals ≥4 inches are not expected.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents affecting port approaches and pilot boarding areas.
